00055 #ifndef INDRI_NETWORKMESSAGESTREAM_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_NETWORKMESSAGESTREAM_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/NetworkStream.hpp"
00059 #include "indri/Buffer.hpp"
00060 
00061 class MessageStreamHandler {
00062 public:
00063   virtual void request( class XMLNode* node ) = 0;
00064   virtual void reply( class XMLNode* node ) = 0;
00065   virtual void reply( const std::string& name, const void* buffer, unsigned int length ) = 0;
00066   virtual void replyDone() = 0;
00067   virtual void error( const std::string& e ) = 0;
00068 };
00069 
00070 class XMLReplyReceiver : public MessageStreamHandler {
00071 private:
00072   bool _done;
00073   std::string _exception;
00074   class XMLNode* _reply;
00075 
00076 public:
00077   XMLReplyReceiver() : _done(false), _reply(0) {}
00078   ~XMLReplyReceiver();
00079 
00080   void request( class XMLNode* node ) {
00081     _exception = "XMLReplyReceiver: doesn't accept requests";
00082     _done = true;
00083   }
00084 
00085   void reply( class XMLNode* reply ) {
00086     _reply = reply;
00087   }
00088 
00089   void reply( const std::string& name, const void* buffer, unsigned int length ) {
00090     _exception = "XMLReplyReceiver: should only get xml replies";
00091     _done = true;
00092   }
00093 
00094   void replyDone() {
00095     _done = true;
00096   }
00097 
00098   void error( const std::string& e ) {
00099     _exception = e;
00100     _done = true;
00101   }
00102 
00103   class XMLNode* getReply() {
00104     return _reply;
00105   }
00106 
00107   bool done() {
00108     return _done;
00109   }
00110 
00111   void wait( class NetworkMessageStream* stream );
00112 };
00113 
00114 class NetworkMessageStream {
00115 private:
00116   Buffer _buffer;
00117   NetworkStream* _stream;
00118   int _readPosition;
00119   int _writePosition;
00120 
00121   int _findEOL();
00122   void _cleanBuffer();
00123   int _bufferLength();
00124 
00125 public:
00126   NetworkMessageStream( NetworkStream* stream );
00127   void read( MessageStreamHandler& handler );
00128   void request( class XMLNode* messageNode );
00129   void reply( class XMLNode* replyNode );
00130   void reply( const std::string& name, const void* buffer, unsigned int size );
00131   void replyDone();
00132   void error( const std::string& errorMessage );
00133   bool alive();
00134 };
00135 
00136 #endif // INDRI_NETWORKMESSAGESTREAM_HPP
